attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We strongly feel that the Prime Minister should take the American directive to stop all failed banks awarding Bonuses on losses accrued. Bonuses should only be paid on a proportion of profits.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
